name: admittedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 used when you are agreeing that something is true, especially unwillingly: Admittedly, I could have tried harder but I still don't think all this criticism is fair.
More examplesFewer examplesAdmittedly, the ball was close to the line, but I'm sure it wasn't out.She is very clever, admittedly, but do you think she has the right personality for the job?Well, admittedly, I am no expert on art, but I think that is awful!Admittedly, there is a serious problem that must be dealt with here.They had a couple of lucky goals but our team were not playing well, admittedly.
